mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discount_rule ( rule_code, rule_name, description, discount_type, discount_value, max_discount, status, effective_start, effective_end ) VALUES ( #{ruleCode}, #{ruleName}, #{description}, #{discountType}, #{discountValue}, #{maxDiscount}, #{status}, #{effectiveStart}, #{effectiveEnd} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, rule_code, rule_name, description, discount_type, discount_value, max_discount, status, effective_start, effective_end, create_time, update_time FROM discount_rule WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, rule_code, rule_name, description, discount_type, discount_value, max_discount, status, effective_start, effective_end, create_time, update_time FROM discount_rule WHERE rule_code = #{ruleCode} AND status = 1 AND (effective_start IS NULL OR effective_start <= #{now}) AND (effective_end IS NULL OR effective_end >= #{now}) LIMIT 1
